name: Jordi Baylina
bio: Jordi is an early adopter of Web3 technologies. He co-founded and became an active member of the White Hat Group, which played a major role in rescuing funds from TheDAO and Parity Multisig hacks. Jordi has also co-founded several Web3 startups including Giveth.io, the first donation tracking platform on Ethereum. He has also co-founded DAppNode, Iden3, and Polygon Hermez. Currently, Jordi serves as the Technical Lead at Polygon Hermez zkRollup and is working on implementing the first complete zkEVM proving system.
